entities.description: Any long-lasting physical problems caused or worsened by stimulant use in the past 12 months.
Continuation of prescription stimulant use despite causing or worsening physical health problems.
Any emotional or mental health problems caused or worsened by stimulant use in the past 12 months.
Continuation of prescription stimulant use despite causing or worsening emotional or mental health problems.

relationships.description: Describes the causal relationship between prescription stimulant use and long-lasting physical problems.
Describes the causal relationship between prescription stimulant use and emotional or mental health problems.
Indicates that the respondent continued using prescription stimulants despite causing or worsening physical health problems.
Indicates that the respondent continued using prescription stimulants despite causing or worsening emotional or mental health problems.
